content.question: ​The polynomial function <math alttext="p"><mi>p</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses equals open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses to the power of 4"><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>4</mn></msup></math>. Which of the following expressions is equivalent to <math alttext="open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses to the power of 4"><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>4</mn></msup></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="x to the power of 4 plus 2 x cubed plus 4 x squared plus 8 x plus 16"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn></math>

​<math alttext="x to the power of 4 plus 4 x cubed plus 6 x squared plus 4 x plus 1"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

​<math alttext="x to the power of 4 plus 8 x cubed plus 24 x squared plus 32 x plus 16"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>24</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>32</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn></math>

​<math alttext="2 x to the power of 4 plus 8 x cubed plus 12 x squared plus 8 x plus 2"><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="x to the power of 4 plus 8 x cubed plus 24 x squared plus 32 x plus 16"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>24</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>32</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn></math>

topic.text: 1.11: Equivalent Representations of Polynomial and Rational Expressions

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
